summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 5, 1st Subdivision of Washington Park Addition, being the alley between 34th Avenue North and 36th Avenue North, from East Valley Street to East Ward Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12092 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
